attributes.action: Re-instate the Chris Moyles breakfast show.
attributes.additional_details:
In time of recession and when everyone is feeling low, the last thing we need is the BBC to ignore the fee paying public by giving Chris Moyles the push.

This man has made millions laugh on the way to work every morning for years and this country will be a much unhappier place without him.

the show needs to be continued from September and Ben Cooper needs to sacked for making such a poor decision that can effect the happiness of this hard working nation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
